import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { solid, brands } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core/import.macro'; import { faFacebook } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free-brands' function Login() { function clickSignUp() { const sign_in_btn = document.querySelector("#sign-in-btn"); const sign_up_btn = document.querySelector("#sign-up-btn"); const container = document.querySelector(".container"); container.classList.add("sign-up-mode"); } function clickSignIn() { const sign_in_btn = document.querySelector("#sign-in-btn"); const sign_up_btn = document.querySelector("#sign-up-btn"); const container = document.querySelector(".container"); container.classList.remove("sign-up-mode"); } return (
